title: Montague Pianos AI Gallery
summary: Crafted a library of recital scenes and kinetic stills for montaguepianos.co.uk, balancing heritage craft with cinematic lighting.

testimonial.quote: Coldharbour gave us a gallery that finally feels like our sound.
testimonial.author: Tim Montague

title: Piano Tuning Concierge
summary: Built a warm concierge that routes players across pianotuningherts.co.uk, handling voicing questions and booking flow in one chat.

testimonial.quote: Response times dropped to seconds and bookings stayed fully human.
testimonial.author: Lizzie Hardy

title: Concert Chat Companion
summary: chat.montaguepianos.co.uk now guides visitors with live narrative drops, blending voice notes, copy decks, and GSAP pinning.

testimonial.quote: Feels like a resident maestro welcoming every guest.
testimonial.author: Helena Ford
